doc.name: LogicFunction
doc.description: Produce an output token on each firing with a FixPoint value that is equal to the sum of all the inputs at the plus port minus the inputs at the minus port.
doc.author: Man-Kit Leung
doc.port: Input for tokens to be added. This is a multiport of fix point type
Input for tokens to be subtracted. This is a multiport of fix point type.
doc.property: Indicate whether addition or subtraction needs to be performed.
